summary: Michelle takes a job recommended by her counselor that lands her trapped in a mansion with three psychotic siblings hell bent on purging Michelle of her sins.
cast: Elisabeth Röhm|Britne Oldford|Kaylee DeFer|Geneva Carr|Christian Campbell|Heléne Yorke|Tobias Segal|Bess Rous|Natalie Knepp|Michael Sirow|Steve Stanulis|Bonnie Bentley|Natalie Wetta|Emily Fleischer|Kristina Hess|Luke Trevisan|Jake Miller|Phil Haus|Chris McNicholas|Steve Green|Gabrielle Lund-Blom|Daniela Sawyer
title: Darkroom
